page.post_content:
We're excited to celebrate your special day with you! To complete your booking, simply fill out the following deposit form below.
  • Please ensure you have confirmed availability for your reservation of 10+ guests with the reservations team & you have thoroughly read over the following information before completing & submitting this form.
  • Booking Deposit & Payment. To secure your event booking a deposit of $350 or $500.00 is required for reservations of 20 – 39 guests and a deposit of $1000.00 for 40+ guests.
  • Please complete the following Deposit Form to make payment. The final payment can be paid in full on the day of your event, less the deposit amount. This deposit is non-refundable (with exception to the cancellation policy) & will not be reimbursed in any other format
  • The amount will strictly only be deducted from the final bill at your event
  • Please note, deposits cannot be paid with gift cards
page.content:

  • Please note, deposits cannot be paid with gift cards

acf.sub_title: celebrate your special moments with us
acf.header_title: Italian Restaurant - Sydney, Newcastle, Wollongong, Melbourne, Perth & Brisbane | Criniti’s
acf.header_description: Authentic Italian wood fired pizza and pasta in Sydney, Newcastle & Melbourne. With a range of dishes from steaks & burgers, to fresh seafood & gourmet salads. Lunch, Dinner, Dessert and Cocktails!
acf.header_keywords: Authentic Italian wood fired pizza and pasta in Sydney, Newcastle & Melbourne. With a range of dishes from steaks & burgers, to fresh seafood & gourmet salads. Lunch, Dinner, Dessert and Cocktails!

acf.short_description:
Criniti’s Italian Cuisine has arrived at Karrinyup Shopping Centre 

Criniti’s, the beloved Italian dining experience known for its authentic and delicious dishes, has opened its doors in the Karrinyup Shopping Centre on December 6th. Featuring a menu filled with the best of Italian cuisine, Criniti’s will provide a delightful culinary journey for all its guests.

From traditional Italian pizzas to fresh, handmade pasta, and from succulent seafood to mouth-watering desserts, Criniti’s brings the essence of Italy straight to your table. Their dishes are prepared using the freshest ingredients and offer a taste of Italian tradition mixed with innovation, making every meal a unique experience.

Notably, Criniti’s was voted Australia’s Favourite Italian in the I Love Food Awards, and their opening at Karrinyup is eagerly anticipated. The new location promises to continue the tradition of excellence set by its predecessors, with a warm and inviting ambiance perfect for family gatherings, date nights, or just a relaxing meal after a day of shopping.

Bookings are now open, and guests are encouraged to reserve their tables to experience the culinary wonders that Criniti’s offers. Don’t miss the opportunity to embark on an Italian culinary journey like no other!

For more information, to view the menu, or to book a table, please visit Criniti’s Website and La Famiglia
acf.address_street: 200 Karrinyup Rd.,  Karrinyup Shopping Centre, Level G West Deck
acf.full_address: 200 Karrinyup Rd., Karrinyup Shopping Centre, Level G West Deck, WA 6018

acf.short_description:
Criniti’s is the best Italian restaurant in Brighton Le Sands, serving authentic Italian flavours in the Western Suburbs. Conveniently located at 1 & 2 95 The Grand Parade, Brighton-Le-Sands, NSW 2216, our restaurant offers an ideal venue to celebrate with family and friends. Our menu features more than 300 items, including the best-woodfired pizzas, ribs, pasta, seafood, grilled fish, bruschetta, risotto, and more, combining Southern Italian and contemporary Australian cuisine.

At Criniti’s, we take pride in serving the freshest ingredients, cooked to perfection, and served with a smile. Whether you’re in the mood for a quick bite or a leisurely meal, our menu caters to all tastes and dietary requirements. From classic pizzas to hearty pasta dishes, you’ll find something you love at Criniti’s.

Don’t miss the opportunity to experience the best Italian restaurant in Brighton Le Sands. Visit us at Criniti’s Brighton Le Sands and indulge in the flavours of Italy. Make a reservation now at crinitis.com.au and check out our menu to explore our delicious offerings. You can also find us on Google Maps for directions to our location.

As the best Italian restaurant in Brighton Le Sands, we also offer an ideal event location for your function. Our famous 1-meter, 2 meters, and 3 meters woodfired pizzas are prepared using our secret recipe dough and only the freshest ingredients. Our menu also features authentic Italian antipasti, ribs, steaks, burgers, gourmet salads, great cocktails, and an impressive selection of wines. And, of course, no meal at Criniti’s would be complete without one of our authentic Italian classic desserts.

The ambiance of our restaurant is perfect for any occasion, group bookings, or corporate events. Celebrating a birthday in Brighton Le Sands or Celebrating an event in Brighton Le Sands, don’t worry. Criniti’s got you covered. Head to our website, crinitis.com.au, or BOOK NOW to secure your party. At Criniti’s, our set menus cover a range of food, dietary requirements, and unlimited refills* while you celebrate your event at Criniti’s Brighton Le Sands.

Brighton Le Sands Criniti’s is situated along the beachfront and offers diners stunning views of Botany Bay. The restaurant features a spacious indoor dining area with modern decor and an outdoor seating area that is perfect for enjoying the coastal breeze while enjoying a meal.

BOOK NOW

So come and join us at Criniti’s Brighton Le Sands, where you’ll find the perfect spot to dine, relax, and enjoy the best Italian restaurant in Australia.

With plenty of shopping, dining, and entertainment options available, and not to forget this suburb is also home to many sporting clubs, including the Parramatta Eels rugby league team and the [Western Sydney Wanderers football team]. For a quick meal before the game or want to take away woodfired pizza, feel free to [Order Online] to pick up or schedule a pickup before the game. Criniti’s Parramatta is one of the late-night food restaurants to satisfy your Italian cravings. Secure a late-night spot on weekends.

BOOK NOW

So come and join us at Criniti’s Parramatta, where you’ll find the perfect spot to dine, relax, and enjoy the best Italian restaurant in Australia. With our delicious food and welcoming atmosphere.
